page.title: 13MR BRUCE BENTHAM
page.content: We visited Mr Bruce of "Lochaber", Robin Lane, High Bentham. He said how Bentham has changed over the last 50 years. The main differences are:- The roads used to be unsurfaced and the main road between High and Low Bentham was narrow, winding and unlit with very few houses. 50 years ago cars were very rare in Bentham. There are now about the same number of shops but their uses have changed. Nowadays most food is pre-packaged, whereas in the past everything had to be weighed out separately by the grocer. High Bentham used to have a cinema which is no longer there but it does now have it's own health centre and fire station.
